name: Temporal (Rixic)
description:
Project Temporal is a Dystopian Steampunk-esque Puzzle Platformer with Time & Space Manipulation.

As Elijah you use the Arbiter (your gun) to Freeze objects in time and solve puzzles as you navigate the vast spaces the world has to offer, to steal and upgrade your Arbiter for your final expedition in which you destroy the Engine, the power source for the nobles and their hold on the city.

You do so with the help of your partner in crime, Jai, who was raised in a noble family and learned of the atrocities and banished to the city depths. With her knowledge and your skills, your plan is sure to succeed - the only question is at what cost?

Currently only the second level is fully playable. 
The level is fully voice acted by these lovely folks who I had the pleasure of working with:

  • Vlad Doli Dolezal (nuclear_prick) as the Voice of Elijah
  • Maja Z Zietarska (mzietarska / @mzietarska) as the Voice of Jai
  • Jei D. Georgiadis (rose.colored.boy._ / @JeiSpaces)
    Luísa Alves (lumaperdida) as the Voices of the Owl

The wonderful music you'll hear throughout the game was made by:

  • Ikechukwu Onwuagbu (@ikeuon / youtube) as 'The Music Guy'

Soundtrack Link. @Coming Soon.

Average First Demo Playthrough Time: 1.5-3~ hours.
I plan on finishing the first and third level for the game depending on how much time I find myself with and how much people want it. 

Controls
WASD | Movement
Space | Jump
L.  Shift |  Sprint
E | Pickup Collectables
Ctrl | Crouch/Slide
Left Click | Freeze / Reset Switches
Right Click | Use Switch / Use Power Reserve / Pickup/Drop Power Spheres
ESC | Pause/Settings Menu

DEBUG (If you get stuck/bugged out or just want to explore)
0 | Enter/Exit Freecam
F9 | Teleport to Freecam
A playthrough can be found here.

I hope that you enjoy your experience - Rix.
